detailed_goals: Complete the statistical analysis of the chosen datasets.
Refine data cleaning and preprocessing pipelines based on the initial analysis.
Develop and test initial statistical arbitrage trading strategies.
Present preliminary findings and strategies to the CIO and Quantitative Research team.
Finalize the client onboarding process for UHNWIs, integrating KYC/AML checks.
Prepare client documentation and subscription agreements tailored to UHNWIs.

Coordinate with Investor Relations on outreach efforts.
Ensure all marketing materials are compliant with SEC regulations.

Implement procedures for monitoring and reporting compliance with SEC regulations.
Conduct compliance training for all relevant personnel.
Work with Legal Counsel to address any remaining compliance issues.
